Home Page

Welcome to Peter Yao's coin website! On this site you can simulate the flipping of a coin! Besides this home page, the site has 3 other pages. On "Flip one coin," you can simulate the flipping of one coin and see its result. On "Flip multiple coins," you can flip multiple coins and see the result. Finally, on "Guess the result," you can guess the result of a coin flip, and then flip the coin to see if your guess is right!
